title: Best game you've played in 2018?
body:
Title. What's the best game you've played in 2018? 

 Mine would have to be Nioh. Such an amazing, fluid combat system and beautiful art style makes it a near 10/10 for me. If the protagonist wasn't a plank of wood then it would probably earn a perfect score.

 Smash Ultimate is a really close second, though.
